akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition on charge of certain tariffs on aircraft traveling through channel routes

akn:content.akn:p: § 2652. Prohibition on charge of certain tariffs on aircraft traveling through channel routes The United States Transportation Command may not charge a tariff by reason of the use by a military service of an aircraft of that military service on a route designated by the United States Transportation Command as a channel route. (Added Pub. L. 115–91, div. A, title X, § 1044(a), Dec. 12, 2017, 131 Stat. 1555.)
